chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通Whats the most popular means of transportation in your hometown_
chunks.chunk_text: John, where's your brother?How about going to a movie?Sure, the music was great.I like jogging, hiking and dancing.I still have ten more minutes to play.Excuse me, is this seat taken?歡迎收聽齊彬老師的超級英語通Welcome to English All Pass with Kenneth Chee

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通Whats the most popular means of transportation in your hometown_
chunks.chunk_text: Hello everyone, welcome to English All Pass, my name is Kenneth Chee歡迎收聽口說英語通,我是齊彬老師In this unit, we are going to talk about public transportation這個單元裡,我們要來練習說大眾交通運輸工具好,首先就讓我們來聽一下這個單元的問題以及示範回答

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通Whats the most popular means of transportation in your hometown_
chunks.chunk_text: Yes, I do

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通Whats the most popular means of transportation in your hometown_
chunks.chunk_text: As for the most popular means of transportation without any doubt, I would say motorbikes.Lots of people travel by scooter.The reason why it is so popular, I think, is their mobility.Motorcycles are easy to maneuver in cramped spaces.You can smoothly ride through the traffic.Motorcycles are convenient for single persons to go to work, to run errands, or just to

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通Whats the most popular means of transportation in your hometown_
chunks.chunk_text: move about town.Of course, not on rainy days.

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通Whats the most popular means of transportation in your hometown_
chunks.chunk_text: The most popular public transportation.

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通Whats the most popular means of transportation in your hometown_
chunks.chunk_text: The subway system in my city is efficient, spotlessly clean, and always runs on time.

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通Whats the most popular means of transportation in your hometown_
chunks.chunk_text: Subway system 指的就是地鐵系統Efficient 形容詞有效率的Spotlessly clean 就是非常乾淨的Spotlessly 是一個副詞表示非常乾淨,一塵不染的Always runs on time 通常指的是交通運輸工具準時發車What's best?All the subway trains are air-conditioned.

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通Whats the most popular means of transportation in your hometown_
chunks.chunk_text: 最棒的是所有的地鐵車廂都有冷氣What's best? 是一個片語表示最棒的事那麼這個best 我們可以換一下 比如說What's better? 更好的事或是What's worse? 更糟的事Subway trains 就是地鐵車廂Train 在這裡指的是車廂Air-conditioned 指的是有空調的 那當然就是有冷氣的意思

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通Whats the most popular means of transportation in your hometown_
chunks.chunk_text: 接著就來說一下最受歡迎的public transportation As for the most popular means of transportation without any doubt, I would say motorbikes至於最受歡迎的大眾交通運輸工具 無庸置疑 我會說摩托車Popular 是一個形容詞 就是受歡迎的Means of transportation 就是交通運輸工具

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通Whats the most popular means of transportation in your hometown_
chunks.chunk_text: Without any doubt 是一個片語 就是不用懷疑的Motorbike 就是摩托車了Lots of people travel by scooter 和大家都騎摩托車那Motorbike 跟Scooter 有什麼不同呢?

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通Whats the most popular means of transportation in your hometown_
chunks.chunk_text: Motorcycle 指的是跨座式的這樣的摩托車Scooter 指的是不用跨座型的摩托車所以在英文裡用騎乘的方式分成了兩種The reason why it is so popular I think is their mobility我想會這麼受歡迎的理由 就是移動方便The reason why 就是什麼什麼的理由Mobility 是一個名字

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通Whats the most popular means of transportation in your hometown_
chunks.chunk_text: Mobility 指的是行動性它的形容詞就是Mobile 就是行動電話的那個Mobile phone的MobileMotorcycles are easy to maneuver in cramped spacesYou can smoothly ride through the trafficMotor車輛在擁擠的空間中很容易操控You can smoothly ride through the traffic

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通Whats the most popular means of transportation in your hometown_
chunks.chunk_text: Motorcycles are convenient for single persons to go to workTo run errands or just to move about town

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通Whats the most popular means of transportation in your hometown_
chunks.chunk_text: Single persons 指的是個人Run errands 是個片語 表示的是跑腿Move about 就是 move around 指的就是到處移動Of course, not on rainy days 不過當然啦 下雨天就不行了Language focus 學習焦點

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通Whats the most popular means of transportation in your hometown_
chunks.chunk_text: The reason why 什麼的理由Why 後面所引導的是一個關西父子子句那麼要提醒您的是Why 後面的子句必須是一個完整子句我們看一下例子The reason why they succeeded is obvious他們成功的理由很明顯啊接著

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通Whats the most popular means of transportation in your hometown_
chunks.chunk_text: 他們做的理由還是個謎啊The reason why people are getting fat is mostly caused by overeating人們不斷變胖的理由主要是由喫太多所造成的

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通Whats the most popular means of transportation in your hometown_
chunks.chunk_text: 一塵不染的Means of transportation 片語交通工具Without any doubt 片語毫無疑問Scooter 名詞 摩托車Mobility 名詞 可動性 活動性Maneuver 動詞 操縱 控制

chunks.episode_title: 一天10分鐘 口說英語通Whats the most popular means of transportation in your hometown_
chunks.chunk_text: Cramped 形容詞 狹窄的Smoothly 順利的Run errands 片語 跑腿這個單元我們練習的是Public transportation 大眾交通運輸希望您都學會了OK, that's all for this unit最後請記得每日十分鐘讓您變成英語通我是奇兵老師
